Reviews.Title: “This hotel was a great value.”

Reviews.Content: 21 yearold daughter stayed western amber hotel week truly enjoyed ourselves manager extremely accommodating found hotel clean nice respite streets istanbul couple liked complimentary breakfast rooftop restaurant availability internet usage traveling light didnt bring laptop computer hotel available time lot didnt cost euro 20 minutes recall beds fine clean thermostat plus grand bazaar tram sights walk blocks uphill didnt issue 100 cab entire city istanbul hilly beware istanbul nice hotels interspersed throughout neighborhoods ramshackle buildings western amber western amber recommend friend
